snippet: Rangers defenseman Marc Staal missed 29 games after a puck struck him in the right eye in March, but he returned for Game 3, but then did not dress for Game 4.
abstract: Rangers defenseman Marc Staal missed 29 games after a puck struck him in the right eye in March, but he returned for Game 3, but then did not dress for Game 4.

headline.main: Rangers' Staal Says He Decided to Sit Out Game 4
